Name: Average time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and subsequent SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time until SW-Reviewer Declined is performed after SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time for SW-Reviewer Declined compared to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total time between initial SW-AE Assign Reviewers and first SW-Reviewer Declined in a case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time spent in sequences containing multiple SW-Reviewer Declined activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average time between consecutive SW-Reviewer Declined activities in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average duration of review process segments containing SW-Reviewer Declined compared to segments containing SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Unassign Editor
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Editor'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Selection is now due to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time impact of SW-Reviewer Declined on overall manuscript review timeline
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variant pathways
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average duration of reviewer assignment phase when SW-Reviewer Declined occurs versus when it doesn't occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Time between SW-Reviewer Declined and subsequent SW-Reviewer Unavailable in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'
